column6: notes
Logan changes his mind about Kendall taking over
Shiv initially refuses to back Kendall because she wants to take over
Logan betrays Kendall
Kendall betrays logan
Roman betrays Kendall in the vote because Logan scares him
When destroying documents for Tom, Greg keeps some for his owns safety
Ewan refuses to give Greg his money, instead giving it to Greenpeace
Greg sues Ewan for refusing to give him his money
In order to protect Logan and the company, Tom betrays Shiv and foils their plan
Stewy and shareholders go against the company
Sandi joins Stewy against the company
Shiv betrays Tom after they get married, setting the tone for their relationship
Logan blackmails Kendall with his accident to get him to stop being a rebel
Logan tells Shiv he will instead back her as CEO
Logan betrays Shiv by not announcing her as CEO
Greg turns on Tom and co. when he feels they are no longer safe
Greg turns back to Tom when he sees a route for himself
Mattson turns on Waystar and tries to take it for himself
Shiv Betrays the sibblings for her own gain
Mattson betrays Shiv by picking Tom as CEO instead
Shiv betrays Kendall, ultimately decided the company fate
The comapny executives ditch the family and support Mattson for money and power
Shiv and Roman ditch kendall at the wedding
Shiv and Roman talks to Kendall to get information
Lawrence agrees to make a deal with kendall, tricking him into a bad deal
Lawrence refuses to comply with Kendalls requests
Kendall guts the Vaulter company and finally ends Lawrences powertrip
Rhea suddenly decides that PGN will not sell to Waystar
Greg switches up on Tom, causing a small fight
Rhea finally agrees that she will instead talk about selling PGN
An unknown source close to the family leaks info about the cruises scandal
Rhea joins forces with Logan to help the deal pass despite the scandal
Pierce family calls off the deal and fires Rhea for conspiring
